gobblin.source.extractor.extract.kafka

Class SimpleKafkaSchemaRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.metrics.kafka.KafkaSchemaRegistry<String,String>
      • gobblin.source.extractor.extract.kafka.SimpleKafkaSchemaRegistry

  • public class SimpleKafkaSchemaRegistry
extends KafkaSchemaRegistry<String,String>
    Extension of KafkaSchemaRegistry that treats the topic name and the schema as the same string. The getLatestSchemaByTopic(String) topic will simplye return the specified topic name. All other methods throw an UnsupportedOperationException. This class is useful when Kafka records don't have a schema, for example, in KafkaSimpleExtractor or KafkaGsonDeserializer.
